snippet: American Express said a reorganization, mainly to its travel business, would reduce the number of employees by 4 to 6 percent by the end of the year.
abstract: American Express will cut about 5,400 jobs, mainly in its travel business, as it seeks to cut costs and transform its operations.
lead_paragraph: American Express said a reorganization, mainly to its travel business, would reduce the number of employees by 4 to 6 percent by the end of the year.

headline.seo: American Express Announces Revamping and Job Cuts
headline.main: Amex Says It Will Cut 5,400 Jobs in Revamping
headline.print_headline: Amex Says It Will Cut 5,400 Jobs In Revamping
